text: David and Bathsheba is a 1951 American drama movie directed by Henry King and starring Gregory Peck, Susan Hayward, Kieron Moore, Raymond Massey, James Robertson Justice, Jayne Meadows, Dennis Hoey. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for 5 Academy Awards in 1952. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Henry King
title: David and Bathsheba
